messages.title: TODAY IS POLLING DAY. THE CHOICE IS CLEAR
messages.content: A vote for Paul Holmes and Theresa May: STRENGTH AND EXPERIENCE. Jeremy Corbyn is only a few seats away from forming a government. Don't take the risk.

issues.economy: A Britain in which the economy is strong to support world-class public services.
issues.health: A national living wage and proper rights and protections at work.

housing.content: Our modern industrial strategy to spread opportunity across the whole United Kingdom.

images.caption: Paul Holmes standing with Theresa May

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contrasts the strength and stability of Theresa May's leadership with the weakness and instability associated with the Labour candidate and Jeremy Corbyn.
